title: Dazzling Ray
content:
Dazzling Ray 2~20 Damage 2d10Radiant Unleash a beam of brilliant light that Blinds all creatures in its path. Until the spell ends, you can recast the spell. Casting it again may possibly burn you each time you recast it. 10 turns On Save: Targets still take half damage. 18m DEX Save Concentration Short Rest Action
